registration.name: @:cloud-foundry
registration.p1: supports the full application lifecycle, from initial development, through testing to deployment.
registration.p2: Register an existing [[@:cloud-foundry]] endpoint to allow your development team to create and manage their applications.
registration.p3: When registering, choose a unique, recognizable name so that your developers can easily know which [[@:cloud-foundry]] endpoint they are working with.
